sentences.en: Before it was fired, it was perfectly round, but the artist intentionally roughed up the edges.
sentences.cn: 在它被烧制出来前，它相当的圆润。 但艺术家有意地把它的边缘弄粗糙。

sentences.en: But Fine said the FBI did not intentionally violate the law.
sentences.cn: 不过他说,联邦调查局并非有意违反有关法律.

sentences.en: But in the past, we almost never intentionally or successfully utilized such wealth of information in creating, and reusing our knowledge and developed capability.
sentences.cn: 但是在过去，我们几乎从未有意或成功地利用这些丰富的信息创建、重用我们的知识和拓展我们的能力。

sentences.en: He intentionally became struck in the ice and traveled with it across the Arctic Ocean!
sentences.cn: 他故意闯入冰区,随冰漂流,竟然穿越了北冰洋!

sentences.en: He intentionally looks for difficult to deal with ( ly ) .
sentences.cn: 他故意找 别扭.

sentences.en: He received a technical for intentionally hurting the other player.
sentences.cn: 他因故意撞伤队员而被判技术犯规.

sentences.en: He wishes ill to no one except those who intentionally offend him.
sentences.cn: 他不盼任何人倒霉,除去那些有意冒犯他的人.

sentences.en: I didn't say it intentionally.
sentences.cn: 我是无心说的.

sentences.en: I had not intentionally tried to shock Uncle Tom.
sentences.cn: 我并不是故意想惊吓汤姆舅舅.

sentences.en: I've never intentionally hurt anyone.
sentences.cn: 我从没故意伤害过任何人。

sentences.en: Losses caused intentionally or negligently by the lessee shall be borne by the lessee.
sentences.cn: 如因承租人的故意或过失造成损失的,由承租人负担.

sentences.en: Or you can choose to accelerate your growth and intentionally devour life and all it offers .
sentences.cn: 或者你可以选择加速你的成长，有意地吞噬生活及生活所赐予你的一切。

sentences.en: Or you can choose to accelerate your growth and intentionally devour life and all it offers.
sentences.cn: 又或许你可以选择加速自己的成长，故意地挥霍生活及其提供的一切。

sentences.en: She would never intentionally hurt anyone.
sentences.cn: 她从来不会故意伤害任何人。

sentences.en: That he explains him is not intentionally doing this thing.
sentences.cn: 他解释他不是故意做这件事的.

sentences.en: The figures are intentionally misleading.
sentences.cn: 这些数字是在有意误导。

sentences.en: The prevalence of these widgets means they can report on almost all your browsing activity, which can then be linked to databases full of the social data you intentionally share.
sentences.cn: 这些工具的盛行率意味着他们可以报告几乎所有你的浏览活动，然后将它们连接到充满你有意分享的社交数据的数据库中。

sentences.en: The responsibility of anyone who intentionally conceals the facts shall be investigated.
sentences.cn: 故意隐瞒事实真象的,应当追究责任.

sentences.en: To avoid this, he agrees to intentionally turn double agent.
sentences.cn: 为了避免这样, 他同意成为双重间谍.

sentences.en: To disregard intentionally or allow to pass unnoticed or unmentioned.
sentences.cn: 忽略有意地忽视或置之不问或不理.

words.tran_cn: 专心地；一心一意地；心无旁物地
